scripts.rm:front: npm run mkdir && rm -rf ./dist/views && rm -rf ./dist/css && rm -rf ./dist/fonts && rm -rf ./dist/js
scripts.move:front: npm run mkdir && npm run views && npm run css && cp -r ./src/fonts/ ./dist/fonts/ && cp ./node_modules/materialize-css/dist/css/materialize.min.css ./dist/css && cp ./node_modules/materialize-css/dist/js/materialize.min.js ./dist/js
scripts.build:front: npm run mkdir && npm run rm:front && npm run move:front && npm run js
scripts.build:back: npm run mkdir && browserify src/app.js -o dist/app.es5.js --full-paths=false --node -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch: watch "npm run css" ./src/css | watch "npm run views" ./src/views | watch "npm run js" ./src/js
scripts.dev: npm run build:front && run-p -l watch nodemon
scripts.start: npm run build:front && npm run build:back && npm run prod
